blackjack rules

card values

Numbered cards are worth the corresponding number indicated on the card. Face cards (those with pictures on them) are worth 10, except for the Ace, which is worth 1 or 11. A picture combined with an Ace is Blackjack (a value of 21).

betting

Before the game begins, player must place a bet.

The most important blackjack rule is simple: beat the croupier’s hand without going over 21. If you get 21 points exactly on the deal, that is called a “blackjack.” When you’re dealt a blackjack 21, pay out is 2:1.

winning and loosing

When player gets blackjack (21 on hand) croupier checks his cards, if croupier doesn't have 21, player immidiately wins 2:1 bet, if player has more than 21, croupier won. If noone has blackjack, at the end of a game player's and croupier's cards are compared and wins person with higher value or croupier pays back bet if there is a draw.

how to play

First of all, make your bet, then accept it. All in means that you are betting all cash that you have.

After getting your cards you have to choose if you are taking another card(hit button), checking your cards against croupier(by hitting stand) or asking to double your bet and take just one more card(double button).

Now it's croupier turn. Croupier has some rules that he needs to follow. Croupier must take another card when has less than 16 or stand when got 17 or more.

Winner is person which is closer to 21 or got blackjack.
